item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

This week's location is:
Captain's Galley, overlooking Long Island Sound! Also outdoor tiki bar (with jukebox & light-up palm tree)! The beach is RIGHT ACROSS THE STREET!

There's also a full restaurant here with decent food...have a romantic sunset dinner overlooking the Sound with 40 strangers ;) (sample menu here) Free parking.

It's 10 minutes from downtown New Haven (directions below).

Jason suggested this place since it is on the water (well, yes, I did, but only because Alexis took me there). We will be out on their patio.

I've made a reservation for a group of 40.
They will set out free appetizers for the NHC--ziti, buffalo wings, and fried calamari! Thanks Kelly and Kayla!

Contact is Karen (KBS), 203-535-8751.

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...
Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours.
Ever.

DIRECTIONS

I-95 South to x44
this merges you onto Kimberly Ave/CT-122/Elm St
2nd left onto 1st Ave (there's a light)
Continue on Beach St 0.3 mi, look on your right
-----------------------------------------------

NON-HIGHWAY (starting at New Haven Green):
Go down College St away from the Green 0.5 mi
Slight right at Congress Ave 0.2 mi
Turn left at Howard Ave 0.6 mi
Slight right at Kimberly Ave 0.9 mi
Continue on CT-122/Elm St 0.1 mi
Turn left at 1st Ave 0.8 mi
Continue on Beach St 0.3 mi, look on your right
item.name: Monday Happy Hour: Captain's Galley Bar & Restaurant ON THE BEACH on 8/13
